EnhancedContent:
I encountered a little problem while updating, but fortunately, a friend helped me and told me to delete the Windows system update log. Unfortunately, I don't know how to delete it.

Thank you for your answer.
Title: How to delete the update history in Windows 11
Description:
I encountered a little problem while updating, but fortunately, a friend helped me and told me to delete the Windows system update log. Unfortunately, I don't know how to delete it.

Thank you for your answer.
Author: HoltSawye
